questions.question: Thermo-setting resin is used in core making process because:

answers.b: It imparts collapsibility to core sand
answers.c: It emits a minimum amount of mould and core gases

explanations.a: It imparts high strength to the core.
explanations.b: It imparts collapsibility to the core sand, allowing the core to break down easily during metal casting.
explanations.c: It emits a minimum amount of mold and core gases, which is beneficial for reducing defects in the casting.
explanations.d: Thermo-setting resin is used in the core making process because All the above
